txt.en: 'I'm afraid I have no time to play with you. My great plague is finished, and it is time to rain death upon my enemies.'
'Five brave little mice scamper into the cat's den. Brave, foolish little mice.'
Disrupt Lhaereth's plans to distribute the Great Plague.
'Be on your guard, friends. We know not what awaits us.'
'That Uruk did say this place was guarded by Lhaereth's deadliest spawn....'
'Perhaps you should get to YOUR task then, Sister! Entertain them!'
'All my plans, all my plague, undone! But I am not finished, oh no.'
'If you insist, we shall do this together!'

'I promise you this: when you think your battles won, when you think your loved ones safe, when the horrors of Seregost are a faded memory and I am but a lingering nightmare, THEN I will come for you.'
'Brother, it seems you have failed in your task! We have uninvited guests!'

Deep within Seregost, Lhaereth the Stained keeps her plague cauldrons. They contain a new, more virulent Great Plague, which she intends to release upon the realms of the Free Peoples. As you and the Rangers Faeron and Rhadrog are the few resistant to the plague, you must enter the Court of Seregost together and attempt to disrupt Lhaereth's plans.
'And yours will be a slow and painful death.'
'Must I do everything?'
'Good-bye. And sweet dreams!'
'Excellent work! The Throne room must be ahead.'
'You are in my domain, now!'
'Ah, more weapons at my disposal!'
'Ahh, the comforts of home!'
Disrupt Lhaereth the Stained
'Yes, let us dine in comfort!'
'Come, Khílnat! Your brood is in need!'
'No! We have failed!'
<rgb=#FF0000>'The Rangers have fallen! You have failed!'</rgb>
Dulgabêth has been defeated!
'We'll handle Lhaereth! Destroy the Cauldrons!'
The Morroval Twins have been defeated!
Lhaereth's plans have been disrupted!
Defeat The Morroval Twins
<rgb=#FF0000>'The Bats have escaped! You have failed!' </rgb>
Defeat Dulgabêth the Broken
'Ugh. That's a familiar stench. These must be the dreaded Plague Pits.'
'No! You no pass! Mama busy!'
'I said no! Going to smash you to bits!'
'Persistent little mice, aren't you? As you wish. Come and face my wrath!'
'You struggle against the very hand of fate, fools. I will have my justice. Gondor will pay for Sauron's death, and you can do nothing to stop me!'
'You must not let the bats escape!'
'Come, my pets! My greatest work is ready!'
'No! Another bat has escaped!'
'Rhadrog and I will engage her and do what we can to delay her. You must destroy the cauldrons before her bats can release the plague!'
'If one more bat escapes... it will be too late!'
'Well, that was ominous.'
'Indeed. But at least for the time being, the realms of Men are safe. '
'No!'
'I wonder if Lhaereth is home.'
'We are about to find out.'
'Mrrrrrrnnnn....'
'Dulgabêth, my dear? Come out and deal with these pests.'
'Is that the Mouth of Sauron? What happened to him?'
'If she did that to an ally, I shudder to think about what she has planned for us!'
'I believe that is the price you pay for displeasing The Lady of Blight.'
'We must move quickly and stop her from releasing her plague!'
'There must be a way forward behind the throne!'
'Indeed there is, and it descends....'
'Why does that make me more nervous?'
The Court of Seregost -- Tier 1
